glossdef.para: The process begins when one of the entry criteria is satisfied.
The Statement of Work or other initial artifact, such as a statement of allocated system requirements, is available.
Changes, including additions and correctiosn to the Software Requirements, are proposed.
A completed increment is ready for customer execution and evaluation.

formalpara.title: Entry work products and the following supporting work products are available
formalpara.para: The Engineering Change Log and the Increment Evaluation Report, if any, contain customer feedback from increment execution and may identify proposed changes to requirements.
